name: Aymano Source
subtitle: All my favorites apps in one place.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of the best apps to sideload

apps.localizedDescription:
The Limón Emulator is an open-source and free Nintendo 3DS Emulator for iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV, developed by Antique and other GitHub contributors.
 
The Limón Emulator is a blessing for iOS and Apple TV users as it enables the iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV users to play Nintendo 3DS games on their devices for absolutely free.
apps.name: Limón
apps.subtitle: A 3DS emulator for iPhone.
